website_summaries.verdict: The sound quality and bass reproduction are good, and the easy to use microphone makes this a good option for users who need headphones for gaming or smartphone use.
pros: Headphones fold up for easy portability
Headband can be adjusted to the desired size

Sound quality is adequate, especially for users who like to hear the bass in their music, as the 30-millimeter driver and Deep Bass technology combine to offer clear bass reproduction with little distortion
When connected to a gaming PC or smartphone, the microphone can be operated with a 1-touch remote while providing clear 2-way communication
cons: Some users report that the audio cord can fray quickly with frequent use

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my adult son for Christmas. He loves the quality sound it provides, and likes the fact that the band lays flat on your head. Unfortunately, he only had the item a few months and it broke. However, in all fairness, my son is hard on gadgets. He tends to ride his bike with headphones on, or while talking on his cell phone and the items end up getting damaged. So if you treat this Headband with care and respect, it will probably last a lot longer. Meanwhile, enjoy your tunes!
customer_reviews.author: Survivor

customer_reviews.title: Good headphone, but a little bothersome after a long period of use
customer_reviews.text: I really like that these headphones reproduce sound at high volumes, definitely higher than my phones' speaker can, so be careful when increasing all the way to the max!! But, I have noticed that after about an hour or two of use, it starts pinching my head, and become uncomfortable. Every head is different, so it may not bother other users, though. It has no noise cancellation feature, FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Felix L. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Absolute must
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have amazing sound quality and deep bass! For the money it is totally worth it! If everything else in this world was as good for the money like these headphones, there would be A LOT more happy people! Will be buying another pair for the gym, cause after wearing earbuds while working out the sound quality cant compare to these to get you pumped up!
customer_reviews.author: dave rea

customer_reviews.title: Quit working easily
customer_reviews.text: These are the 3rd or 4th pair of these JBL headphones we’ve bought for our daughter. The first pair, she accidentally broke . On both the 2nd and 3rd pairs we bought, the left side stopped working. Visually I could see no signs of damage .
customer_reviews.author: pcgeekbydaysuperdadbynight

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, attractive, good sound quality-- and INEXPENSIVE! We go through headphones FAST here (dogs get a hold of them!) So these are a great option!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Deb

customer_reviews.title: Terribly low quality audio! 👎😡
customer_reviews.text: I'm supremely disappointed in these headphones. I'd purchased this brand before and they were awesome. 🎧🎶 These are super low quality, and not worth more than $5, it that. 🔉👎 I'd return them but I didn't notice the crappy return policy the seller (Electronic Express) had, so I unfortunately ended up throwing away money on these. 💸 Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Sapiosexy Bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: They work great...
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my 6 year old to use at school - she loves them. They fit her small head, but could definitely expand to fit an adult comfortably and without too much pressure. I also like how they fold up for flat storage to tuck them in a backpack or in a desk. They also do a fairly good job at limiting background noise. I'm very satisfied, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: clean sound and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I sleep with these, I mean they go through something. I've had them for over a year (a record for me) and they still work perfectly fine. I love these!!
customer_reviews.author: nancy fonkoua

customer_reviews.title: Broke shortly after receiving!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these for her iPad and she’s had 2 or 3 pairs over the years. They eventually wear out like anything else that is used everyday for a long period of time. But this current pair we recently bought broke shortly after getting it! The sound stopped working! Useless item now....
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: the last headphones you'll ever buy
customer_reviews.text: dont be fooled by the others that are out there. I've had a part of these headphones for the better part of 7 or 8 years....and when the duct tape couldn't hold them together and more I found them.on here .once I did I ordered two pair because I know that by getting these I shouldn't need headphone for like the next 10 to 15 year ...no b.s.
customer_reviews.author: jeffery hines

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They are reasonably priced and they have good sound quality along with blocking out other noise. If I can get my daughter to quit taking off the padding and chewing the cord I wouldn't have to purchase any more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Solid sound for a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after my first pair broke(lasted about 4 years of use and travel). I like them for the low price, great sound, and simple/compact design. Additionally I enjoy the Mic and it's button that can be used to pause/play/skip music on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for phone calls
customer_reviews.text: Great for phone conversations. They pick up my breath when singing karaoke but great qualify for an economy set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Laureen S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Ordered three and they are all working well.
customer_reviews.author: Deep Diver

customer_reviews.title: Good set of headphone for general listening.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second set. It does the job without spending a whole lot of money and our other one has not broken.
customer_reviews.author: sdonohue

customer_reviews.title: The quality is terrific and they block the outside noise well!😀😁😃😎
customer_reviews.text: I loved how it blocks the outside noise and the sound quality is amazing! I use this product to enjoy high quality music without outside interruptions.
customer_reviews.author: George Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sound
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones they lasted longer than any I've ever had and I share them with my 5 year old so a year with no problems I say was a good deal just ordered my second pair
customer_reviews.author: ranee

customer_reviews.title: good sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: i prefer high treble and crisp. this delivers for the price.
customer_reviews.author: joseph03565

customer_reviews.title: They last several years, I had a black pair that lasted me 5-6 years, they may last longer
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my tablet, I love these headphones because there comfortable lightweight and can be stored easly!
customer_reviews.author: FNAF fan 555

customer_reviews.text: The metal came off the wire and broke within less than a week so it couldn't be used anymore
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: can fits any heads
customer_reviews.text: Product works as described. I am very satisfied with the product. Sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: ... and headphones were in backwards BUT they do work Great. Im just wondering if they are actually new
customer_reviews.text: The product package had been opened and headphones were in backwards BUT they do work Great. Im just wondering if they are actually new.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use it for cell phone conversations. It works great
customer_reviews.author: Garcia Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: After a few months - the cord is showing lots of wear and ear
customer_reviews.author: Jen B

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset for Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great Headset for Great Price. We're using these for online Zoom conference calls & so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Beck

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for little money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headphone in an emergency. We had a dance gig but forgot the cups so I had to get one. For twenty bucks, it will do the job. It said on the box "extra bass"...they we're not lying! Plenty of bass on this inexpensive headphone. The highs were there but overpowered by pronounced mids. But not as bad as the mids on the Monoprice DJ Headphone. I'll take the JVC anytime over the Monoprice. But I still prefer the Koss SportaPro in the under $30 category. By the way, the JVC has a built-in microphone so you can use it on your smart phone. Big results for little money. Not bad!
customer_reviews.author: FotoguyTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are mostly a positive. Great sound quality over earbuds and at a cheap price. I bought mine from my university bookstore for $25 which is more than Amazon. The only negative is something that is rather important and is the reason why I don't give these a 5/5. I can't wear these headphone longer than 45 to 60 minutes long because they hurt my ears for some reason. I'm not sure why. When my ears hurt I have to remove these headphones and put in earbuds. Rubbing my ears helps alleviate the pain. I'd rate comfort 2/5 but everything else is a perfect 5/5. Overall: 3/5
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit is matter
customer_reviews.text: First of all this earphone has foldable pads and this is what make them like no others. They fit to my ears in perfect way without leaving gaps on the bottom like every other style of earphone does. My puppy chewed up its wire, so I am very happy that found this model to replace the damaged one. All in all it was fine for 2 weeks I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Lubushka

customer_reviews.title: Awesome  $20 heasphone !
customer_reviews.text: Great value! You'll be hard pressed to find a better sounding $20 pair of headphones. These are no different than many other headphones in that they need a break in period before they sound their best. They sounded pretty crappie, like a lot of muddy midrange right out of the box. Let them play 6+ hours , at a reasonably loud level, and they'll compete well against much more expensive headphones. I've listened to Bose, Beats, Sennheiser, Audiotechnica, Denon, which all did sound better, but they all cost a LOT more.
customer_reviews.author: BigTwinRider1964

customer_reviews.title: DJ Headphone Industry Exposed! What you need is easy and available,  JVC HA SR 185 Review
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after my panasonic headphones started loosing sound in one ear. Solid headphones, good magnet size so the bass is loud and they're pretty comfortable. The microphone works great too as I've used it for Skype sessions, but I like how these headphones unlike most with a mic, are still quite loud. I've got a video review too! So far these have lasted me wayy longer than some headphones I paid triple for.
customer_reviews.author: David Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical odor outgassing
customer_reviews.text: I had to return then because of a strong chemical odor outgassing, then when I was packing them back up I noticed a cancer warning. I’ve bought several of the basic (cheaper) JVC flat pack headphones in the past and they do not have this order. They break easily on the headband if you’re rough with them or have kids...but are cheap and good.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Budget Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several affordable headphones, in the past, and I gotta say... these are the best pair. I know this doesn't have the best sound quality, but it's better than the Sony and Skullcandy headphones in the same price range. I've owned my pair for a couple years, now, constantly listening to music at full volume, for an hour or two, almost every day, and the quality of the sound hasn't suffered at all, and the cord is still in good condition. If these $25 headphones are this good, I wonder how better JVC's more expensive headphones are...?
customer_reviews.author: eh8789

customer_reviews.title: The Best $20 Headset
customer_reviews.text: I am giving these 5 Stars because they're only $20 and they sound great. No, they're not Sennheisers, but you won't find a better sounding headset for that price. I only use them at work for GoToMeetings and Cisco Jabber on my laptop. Music sounds good too, not great, but good. $20 is an amazing price for these bad boys. In fact, I paid $26 for these at Fry's.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Makiling

customer_reviews.title: i love them cant believe so cheap for thundering bass and loud and clear sound
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion these sound better than beats bass is close to skullcandy crushers i use dolby equalizer it really brings out the bass mids and highs lots of bass and very clear you will be surprised i was iv played rap country dubstep and metal on these they sound great the metal didnt sound the best to be honest but if you love bass like heavy bass get these use a EQ and jam out definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Coworker loves them
customer_reviews.text: My coworker Chris recently obtained a pair of these bad boys. He uses them instead of the apple headphones for work purposes. They may be noise cancelling on the inside, however, on the outside I can still hear his music and / or conference calls. It's almost like I am wearing them myself. They are not very stylish as I imagine that an elementary school DJ also wears these. He seems to really like them, so 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY JVC
customer_reviews.text: They lasted about 3 months and then stopped working. I have not had any luck with anything JVC.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved these headphones...
customer_reviews.text: Loved these headphones but they can't withstand a 185 pound man so I am looking to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: A L Burrow

customer_reviews.title: Dont waiste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at walmart for $19.99 and im taking them back. These are not worth the money. They sound very flat. Cant even hear the base and highs and mids are garbage. Also there not very loud at all. Riding in the car i can hear the outside noise.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: JVC Lightweight Flat Foldable On Ear Colorful Lightweight Foldable Headband with Mic, Black (HASR185B)

High quality sound reproduction with 30mm neodymium driver unit
Powerful deep bass achieved with dynamic bass port
2-Way foldable (flat & compact) design for compact portability
Lightweight design for comfortable long period of use
